name: Jumbo
description:
Jumbo is a computer airplane simulation for multiple systems.

The player flies a jumbo jet from a 1st person perspective, with the goal to fly between locations on a map. The player controls the throttle, engines, elevator, aileron, and flaps on their aircraft. The player must carefully monitor the fuel, direction, altitude, elevation, and attitude of their vessel. A map is available to help the player with navigation.
